title: Convert Bytes to DWORD
description: This function takes four individual BYTE values and combines them into a single DWORD value. The bytes are combined in the order of B3, B2, B1, and B0, where B3 represents the highest byte and B0 represents the lowest byte.
name: DWORD_OF_BYTE

input.name: B3
input.description: The highest byte of the DWORD.

input.name: B2
input.description: The second highest byte of the DWORD.

input.name: B1
input.description: The third byte of the DWORD.

input.name: B0
input.description: The lowest byte of the DWORD.

return_value.description: The combined DWORD value generated from the four input BYTE values.
